creator: stevec@ignitesports.com
text:
per Greg Frank added a "label" attribute option permitting a specific StarTeam
label rather than the most recent code, to be checked out.  Cleaned/tidied up
code a bit in regard to line width.

creator: stevec@ignitesports.com
text:
Created attachment 931
changes to code and documentation as described in bug 5557

creator: stevec@ignitesports.com
text:
Created attachment 933
Revised patch fix bug where ST status checked inappropriately

PLEASE DO NOT APPLY patch in attachment #931.
Instead, apply patch #933 which contains all the changes in 931 plus a bug fix.
The bug fix is that when the rootlocalfolder attribute was set, it is
inappropriate to check the star team file status as a test of whether to check
the file out, since the status does not pertain to the directory where the files
are checked out to.  Thus, in some situations, files were not being checked out
that should have been.  This fix correctly handles this situation by not
checking the status in that situation.
creator: stevec@ignitesports.com
stevec@ignitesports.com
text:
I am pulling this bug out of the queue because 
1)I have some free time on the holidays and want to do more and 
2)the committers may be otherwise occupied
3)I can't get the patches to apply

so PLEASE, do NOT APPLY ANY OF THESE PATCHES.

I will resubmit this as a new bug when my next set of changes is done.
Thanks.
